title: Unhandled Exception - 'Access to the path 'DLSSUpdater.exe' is denied.'
body:
I have been unable to update this application (using the internal updater) for multiple releases now.
I keep getting the following error after pressing "Ok" when the application finds a new software-update during startup.
Encountered an unhandled exception: 
 ```System.UnauthorizedAccessException: Access to the path 'DLSSUpdater.exe' is denied.
   at System.IO.FileSystem.RemoveDirectoryRecursive(String fullPath, WIN32_FIND_DATA& findData, Boolean topLevel)
   at System.IO.FileSystem.RemoveDirectory(String fullPath, Boolean recursive)
   at DlssUpdater.Windows.Splashscreen.Splashscreen.OnContentRendered(EventArgs e)
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.<>c.<ThrowAsync>b__128_0(Object state)
   at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.InternalRealCall(Delegate callback, Object args, Int32 numArgs)
   at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.TryCatchWhen(Object source, Delegate callback, Object args, Int32 numArgs, Delegate catchHandler)```

I have tried running the application ad "Admin", but that doesn't help.

I am running Windows 10, by the way.

Any ideas?

comments.body: @Dazog The newest release "2.0.5.2" should fix your issue. Could you check that?

No more crashes with 2.0.5.2

Appears to be resolved.

title: Only one new game can be added manually.
body:
Only one new game can be added manually. See Steps to reproduce. 
Thank you for the awesome app! 

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
When adding a second game manually, the info. of the previously added game is pre-filled in the form. When you change/update the form with 2nd game's info. it then creates a second entry but also overwrites the info. of the 1st game. Thus you can only add one game manually. Not sure if these was fixed in the update 2 days ago. If so, please disregard. 

Completion Criteria: allow for many individual games to be added at any given point.
author: NChag

comments.body:
I can say I found the bug and fixed another UI bug with it too too :D
It will be in 2.0.4.0. Please check if the bug persists after this version is released.
